definitions: おっかない (adj-i) frightening, scary,extreme, exaggerated, huge
english: He's got this killer sword, and looks REAL scary…
japanese: ぶっそうな刀なんか持ち歩いてさ。なんか、おっかないヤツだったよ……

definitions: 弓[ゆみ] (n) bow (and arrow),archery,bow (for a violin, etc.)
湯[ゆ] (n) hot water,hot bath, hot spring,molten iron
柚子[ゆず] (n) yuzu (Citrus ichangensis x C. reticulata)
english: I want you to stop that talk about Meteor falling on us!
japanese: メテオが落ちてくるだって！？やめてほしいぜ、そーゆーことはよ

definitions: 逸する[いっする] (vs-s) to lose (a chance), to miss (a chance),to overlook, to omit, to forget,to deviate
english: Listen, I work hard…and now you're tellin' me Meteor's gonna smash everything to bits?
japanese: 今までいっしょうけんめい働いてきたのによぉ メテオでみんな、パーになっちまうってか！？

definitions: 馬鹿らしい[ばからしい] (adj-i) absurd
english: Well, I ain't standin' around listenin' to fool talk like this. Makes a person lose the will to work, that's what it does!
japanese: ケッ、ばからしくて、やってられっかよ。まじめに働く気なんか失せちまったぜ

definitions: 真面目[まじめ] (adj-na, n) serious, honest, sober, grave, earnest, steady
english: Well, I ain't standin' around listenin' to fool talk like this. Makes a person lose the will to work, that's what it does!
japanese: ケッ、ばからしくて、やってられっかよ。まじめに働く気なんか失せちまったぜ

definitions: 失せる[うせる] (v1, vi) to disappear, to vanish, to fade away,to go, to leave,to die
english: Well, I ain't standin' around listenin' to fool talk like this. Makes a person lose the will to work, that's what it does!
japanese: ケッ、ばからしくて、やってられっかよ。まじめに働く気なんか失せちまったぜ

definitions: 大童[おおわらわ] (adj-na, n) strenuous efforts, hard fighting
english: And all of Midgar's gonna be destroyed by a falling meteor? Oh, don't make me laugh!
japanese: ミッドガルじゃ、メテオを破壊しようとおおわらわらしいぜ

definitions: 残[ざん] (n, pref) remaining, left-over, excess
english: I heard the remaining members of AVALANCHE smashed the Shinra troops at Midgar.
japanese: ミッドガルじゃ、アバランチの残堂が神羅カンパニーを叩きつぶしたらしいぜ

definitions: 叩く[たたく] (v5k, vt) to strike, to clap, to knock, to beat, to tap, to pat,to play drums,to abuse, to flame (e.g. on the Internet), to insult,to consult, to sound out,to brag, to talk big,to call, to invoke (e.g. a function)
叩く[はたく] (v5k, vt) to dust, to remove dust,to slap, to hit (with the palm),to use up money
english: I heard the remaining members of AVALANCHE smashed the Shinra troops at Midgar.
japanese: ミッドガルじゃ、アバランチの残堂が神羅カンパニーを叩きつぶしたらしいぜ

definitions: 跳ね除ける[はねのける] (v1, vt) to push aside, to brush or thrust aside, to remove, to get rid of
english: They say the remaining members of AVALANCHE broke Shinra's resistance and destroyed the Mako cannon at Midgar.
japanese: ミッドガルでは、アバランチの残堂が神羅カンパニーの抵抗をはねのけて魔晄キャノンを破壊したという話だ

definitions: キャノン (n) cannon
english: They say the remaining members of AVALANCHE broke Shinra's resistance and destroyed the Mako cannon at Midgar.
japanese: ミッドガルでは、アバランチの残堂が神羅カンパニーの抵抗をはねのけて魔晄キャノンを破壊したという話だ

definitions: 施設[しせつ] (n) institution, establishment, facility,home (for elderly, orphans, etc.)
english: I heard Shinra's taking it's biggest artillery from Junon and other facilities and gathering it in Midgar to fight Meteor and Weapon.
japanese: 神羅カンパニーは、メテオやウェポンに対抗するため、各地の施設から役にたちそうなものを、ジュノンやミッドガルに集めているという話だ

definitions: 通り[どおり] (n-suf) in accordance with, following,roughly, about,Street, Avenue
english: You can't go into a tail spin at a time like this. You've got to keep living just like before. At least that's what I think…
japanese: こんな時だからこそ、ヤケにならずに今までどおりキチンと生活していかなきゃいけない、そう思うんだ

definitions: 潰れる[つぶれる] (v1, vi) to be crushed, to be smashed, to be broken, to collapse,to become useless, to cease functioning, to be wasted (e.g. time),to go bankrupt, to go out of business, to fail
english: Dear, can you believe it? They say that Shinra's gone under!!
japanese: あなた、信じられる！？あの神羅カンパニーがつぶれちゃったんですって！！

definitions: 余計[よけい] (adv) too many, too much, excessive, superfluous, superabundant, extra, spare, surplus,unnecessary, needless, uncalled-for, otiose,abundantly, excessively, needlessly, all the more
english: This world is coming to an end all because some terrorists called AVALANCHE stuck their noses in the wrong place!
japanese: アバランチなんていうテロリストが余計なことしてくれたおかげでもう、この世はおしまいよ

definitions: この世[このよ] (n, adj-no) this world, the present life (in contrast to the land of the dead)
english: This world is coming to an end all because some terrorists called AVALANCHE stuck their noses in the wrong place!
japanese: アバランチなんていうテロリストが余計なことしてくれたおかげでもう、この世はおしまいよ

definitions: コントローラー (n) controller
english: Then let me explain how to use the world map.
japanese: それじゃ、ワールドマップでのコントローラ操作について説明してあげるとしよう

definitions: 視点[してん] (n) opinion, point of view, visual point
english: Changing camera angles
japanese: 視点の切替について

definitions: 切り替え[きりかえ] (n) exchange, conversion, replacement, switching (to), switchover
english: Changing camera angles
japanese: 視点の切替について

definitions: 左右[さゆう] (n, vs) left and right,influence, control, domination

兎角[とかく] (n) (doing) various things, (doing) this and that,being apt to, being prone to, tending to,at any rate, anyhow, anyway,all sorts of (negative things), various,things that do not exist, [object Object]
english: Then rotate the camera either way by pressing [PAGEUP] or [PAGEDOWN].
japanese: そして【Ｌ１ボタン】や【Ｒ１ボタン】を押してやれば、視点を左右に回してやることができるんだ

definitions: 回す[まわす] (v5s, vt) to turn, to rotate, to spin, to twist, to gyrate, to turn on (something that turns),to pass around, to send around, to hand around, to circulate,to move (someone or something to where its needed), to send, to bring, to transfer, to forward, to direct, to submit,to turn (to a new use), to use (for something else),to put (someone in a position), to make (e.g. an enemy of),to ... around (e.g. chase, fool, play), to do all over, to do everywhere, to do completely,to surround (something) with, to enclose with,to put (an arm) around (e.g. someone's waist), to reach around,to invest (money), to lend,to dial (a telephone number),to gang-rape
english: Then rotate the camera either way by pressing [PAGEUP] or [PAGEDOWN].
japanese: そして【Ｌ１ボタン】や【Ｒ１ボタン】を押してやれば、視点を左右に回してやることができるんだ

definitions: 試す[ためす] (v5s, vt) to attempt, to test, to try out
english: Try different angles until you find the one you like best. It makes the journey a lot more fun!
japanese: いろいろ試してみて自分にあった視点をさがしてやれば旅は、もっと楽しくなると思うよ

definitions: 小さい[ちいさい] (adj-i) small, little, tiny,slight, below average (in degree, amount, etc.), minor, small,low (e.g. sound), soft (e.g. voice),unimportant, petty, insignificant, trifling, trivial,young, juvenile
english: There is a large and small map. Learn when to use which and you won't get lost.
japanese: 地図には、大きいものと小さいものがあるから場合によって使い分けてやれば道に迷うことも少なくなると思うよ

definitions: 使い分ける[つかいわける] (v1, vt) to use properly, to use (different things) for different purposes
english: There is a large and small map. Learn when to use which and you won't get lost.
japanese: 地図には、大きいものと小さいものがあるから場合によって使い分けてやれば道に迷うことも少なくなると思うよ

definitions: 少ない[すくない] (adj-i) few, a little, scarce, insufficient, seldom
english: There is a large and small map. Learn when to use which and you won't get lost.
japanese: 地図には、大きいものと小さいものがあるから場合によって使い分けてやれば道に迷うことも少なくなると思うよ

definitions: 切り替える[きりかえる] (v1, vt) to change, to exchange, to convert, to renew, to throw a switch, to replace, to switch over
english: Push [START] twice to change the size of the map, and once more to turn it off.
japanese: 【スタートボタン】を何回か押してやれば地図を切り替えたり、消すことができるんだ。便利だろ？

definitions: 消す[けす] (v5s, vt) to erase, to delete, to cross out,to turn off power,to extinguish, to put out,to bump off
english: Push [START] twice to change the size of the map, and once more to turn it off.
japanese: 【スタートボタン】を何回か押してやれば地図を切り替えたり、消すことができるんだ。便利だろ？

definitions: 乗り物[のりもの] (n) vehicle, conveyance, transport,ride (playground, fair, carnival), playground facility
english: Ride things by pressing [ASSIST] and get off by pressing [CANCEL]. This isn't so hard, either!
japanese: 【決定ボタン】を押せば、乗り物に乗り【キャンセルボタン】を押せば乗りものから下りる。このへんは、そんなに難しくないね

definitions: 乗り[のり] (n) riding, ride,spread (of paints),-seater (e.g. two-seater),(getting into the) mood, (entering into the) spirit, energy, enthusiasm, rhythm, feeling
english: Ride things by pressing [ASSIST] and get off by pressing [CANCEL]. This isn't so hard, either!
japanese: 【決定ボタン】を押せば、乗り物に乗り【キャンセルボタン】を押せば乗りものから下りる。このへんは、そんなに難しくないね

definitions: 降りる[おりる] (v1, vi) to descend (e.g. a mountain), to go down, to come down,to alight (e.g. from bus), to get off, to disembark, to dismount,to step down, to retire, to give up, to quit,to be granted, to be issued, to be given,to form (of frost, dew, mist, etc.),to be passed (from the body; e.g. of a roundworm)
english: Ride things by pressing [ASSIST] and get off by pressing [CANCEL]. This isn't so hard, either!
japanese: 【決定ボタン】を押せば、乗り物に乗り【キャンセルボタン】を押せば乗りものから下りる。このへんは、そんなに難しくないね

definitions: ダッシュ (n, vs) dash
english: Oh, right. You can't dash on the World Map, so make sure not to press [CANCEL] unless you want to get off.
japanese: あ、そうそう。ワールドマップではダッシュができないから【キャンセルボタン】は、乗り物から下りるときにしか押さない方がいいね

definitions: 特に[とくに] (adv) particularly, especially
english: Remember this because Chocobos will run away as soon as you get off them, so be careful.
japanese: 特にチョコボは下りると逃げちゃうからね。気をつけた方がいいよ

definitions: 小まめ[こまめ] (adj-na) taking care, working well,frequent
english: Once on the World Map you can access the menu to save your game anywhere. It's a good idea to save frequently!
japanese: ワールドマップではメニューを開けばどこでもセーブできるからセーブはこまめにとったほうがいいよ

definitions: 総会[そうかい] (n) general meeting
掃海[そうかい] (n, vs) sweeping the sea for mines, dragging for mines
桑海[そうかい] (n) this world's sudden changes
創開[そうかい] (n, vs) grand opening
壮快[そうかい] (adj-na, n) emotionally uplifting, stirring
爽快[そうかい] (adj-na, n) refreshing, exhilarating, invigorating, bracing
蒼海[そうかい] (n) blue waters
english: Is that so? Well, that's that. Have a nice trip.
japanese: そうかい？　それは残念。それじゃ、よい旅を

definitions: いい加減[いいかげん] (adv) irresponsible, perfunctory, careless,lukewarm, half-baked, halfhearted, vague,reasonable, moderate,considerably, quite, rather, pretty
english: Damn!!
japanese: ……いいかげんに、しろっ！！

definitions: 転じる[てんじる] (v1, vi) to turn, to shift, to alter, to distract
点じる[てんじる] (v1, vt) to drop, to light, to kindle, to make tea
english: …don't mess with me!!
japanese: ……なめてんじゃねぇっ！！

definitions: 友人[ゆうじん] (n) friend
english: Huh? You're looking for your friend? You want to know where the Lifestream is?
japanese: え？　友人をさがしてる？ライフストリームはどこかって？

definitions: ストリーム (n) stream
english: Huh? You're looking for your friend? You want to know where the Lifestream is?
japanese: え？　友人をさがしてる？ライフストリームはどこかって？

definitions: 島[しま] (n) island,territory (of a prostitute, organized crime gang, etc.), turf
島[とう] (n-suf, n) Island,insula, island, islet
english: When I traveled to the Southern islands, a doctor was very kind to me. I seem to recall him telling me something about the Lifestream…
japanese: 【南の島】に旅行に言った時ある医者に世話になったんだけどその時に医者からそんな言葉を聞いたような覚えがあるけど……

definitions: 覚え[おぼえ] (n) memory, sense, experience
english: When I traveled to the Southern islands, a doctor was very kind to me. I seem to recall him telling me something about the Lifestream…
japanese: 【南の島】に旅行に言った時ある医者に世話になったんだけどその時に医者からそんな言葉を聞いたような覚えがあるけど……

definitions: 軍[ぐん] (n, n-suf) army, force, troops
戦[いくさ] (n) war, battle, campaign, fight,troops, forces
english: Hey, listen to me! The Shinra troops are on the move.
japanese: あっ、聞いてくれよ！神羅軍の動きが活発になってきたんだ

definitions: 活発[かっぱつ] (adj-na, n) lively, active, vigorous, animated, brisk
english: Hey, listen to me! The Shinra troops are on the move.
japanese: あっ、聞いてくれよ！神羅軍の動きが活発になってきたんだ

definitions: 打ち立てる[うちたてる] (v1, vt) to establish, to formulate
english: The TV news said Rufus came up with two plans. One, is to launch a rocket into space containing Huge Materia…
japanese: テレビによると、ルーファスは２つの作戦を打ち立てたらしいね。なんでもその１つはヒュージマテリアを集めて、ロケットで宇宙に飛ばすとか……

definitions: 飛ばす[とばす] (aux-v, v5s) to let fly, to make fly, to send flying, to blow off (e.g. in the wind), to launch, to fire, to hurl, to shoot,to skip over, to leave out, to omit, to drop (e.g. a stitch),to run fast, to drive fast, to gallop,to spray, to splash, to spatter,to say without reservation, to call out (e.g. a jeer), to rattle of (e.g. a joke),to spread (e.g. a rumour), to circulate, to send out (a message), to issue (e.g. an appeal),to transfer (to a less important post), to send away (e.g. to a provincial branch), to demote,to dispatch quickly (e.g. a reporter),to get rid of, to burn off (alcohol),to attack (e.g. with a leg manoeuvre),to do vigorously, to do roughly, to do energetically
english: The TV news said Rufus came up with two plans. One, is to launch a rocket into space containing Huge Materia…
japanese: テレビによると、ルーファスは２つの作戦を打ち立てたらしいね。なんでもその１つはヒュージマテリアを集めて、ロケットで宇宙に飛ばすとか……

definitions: クレーター (n) crater
english: Sephiroth put up a huge barrier around the North Crater.
japanese: 北のクレーターにセフィロスは巨大なバリアをはったんだ

definitions: 張る[はる] (v5r, vt) to stick, to paste, to affix,to stretch, to spread, to strain, to tighten, to put up (tent),to form (e.g. ice on a pond),to fill, to swell,to stick out, to put, to slap,to be expensive,to keep a watch on, to be on the lookout,to become one tile away from completion,to span, to generate
春[はる] (n-adv, n-t) spring, springtime,New Year,prime (of one's life, etc.),adolescence, puberty,sexuality
はる (v5r, aux-v, suf) to do
english: Sephiroth put up a huge barrier around the North Crater.
japanese: 北のクレーターにセフィロスは巨大なバリアをはったんだ

definitions: ぶち壊す[ぶちこわす] (v5s, vt) to destroy, to crush, to break by striking, to wreck,to spoil, to ruin
english: Rufus wants to use a mammoth cannon to smash the barrier.
japanese: ルーファスは、あの大砲でそれをぶち壊す計画なんだ

definitions: 直接[ちょくせつ] (adj-na, n-adv, adj-no) direct, immediate, personal, firsthand
english: He plans to have Shinra troops rush in and attack Sephiroth after the barrier falls.
japanese: バリアがなくなったスキに神羅軍でセフィロスを直接攻撃するつもりなのさ

definitions: 好機[こうき] (n) good opportunity, chance
english: So now's the time to defeat Sephiroth.
japanese: じゃあ今こそが、セフィロスを倒す好機なわけだ

definitions: 右往左往[うおうさおう] (n, vs, adj-no) moving about in confusion, going every which way, going this way and that
english: But with Rufus dead, the Shinra troops don't know what to do. Heidegger and Scarlet don't have what it takes to lead the troops.
japanese: でも、ルーファスが死んでしまったから神羅軍は右往左往するばかり。ハイデッカーやスカーレットじゃ神羅をまとめるには力不足だし……

definitions: 力不足[ちからぶそく] (n, adj-no, adj-na) lack of ability, inadequacy, (being) out of one's depth
english: But with Rufus dead, the Shinra troops don't know what to do. Heidegger and Scarlet don't have what it takes to lead the troops.
japanese: でも、ルーファスが死んでしまったから神羅軍は右往左往するばかり。ハイデッカーやスカーレットじゃ神羅をまとめるには力不足だし……

definitions: お父さん[おとうさん] (n) father, dad, papa, pa, pop, daddy, dada,husband
english: My old man was a miner, but he couldn't go to work after monsters started appearing in the Mythril Mines.
japanese: ボクのお父さん、炭鉱夫なんだけどミスリルの鉱山にモンスターがでてきて仕事ができなくなっちゃったんだ

definitions: 炭[すみ] (n) charcoal,charred remains
english: My old man was a miner, but he couldn't go to work after monsters started appearing in the Mythril Mines.
japanese: ボクのお父さん、炭鉱夫なんだけどミスリルの鉱山にモンスターがでてきて仕事ができなくなっちゃったんだ

definitions: 坑夫[こうふ] (n) miner
english: My old man was a miner, but he couldn't go to work after monsters started appearing in the Mythril Mines.
japanese: ボクのお父さん、炭鉱夫なんだけどミスリルの鉱山にモンスターがでてきて仕事ができなくなっちゃったんだ

definitions: 酔っ払う[よっぱらう] (v5u, vi) to get drunk
english: Now all he does is sit around getting drunk in the bar…
japanese: 今じゃ、この奥の酒場でお酒ばっかり飲んで酔っぱらっているよ

definitions: 癖[くせ] (n) habit (often a bad habit, i.e. vice), tendency,peculiarity, idiosyncrasy, mannerism,crease, wrinkle, curl, kink
救世[きゅうせい] (n) salvation
曲[くせ] (n-pref) long segment of a noh play forming its musical highlight,wrong, improper, indecent
english: It's sad. Even though he's an adult, he just doesn't want to see the world as it really is. I dunno what to do.
japanese: いい大人のクセに、現実見えていないってのは、情けないよね。まいっちゃうなぁ、もう

definitions: 現実[げんじつ] (n) reality, actuality, hard fact
english: It's sad. Even though he's an adult, he just doesn't want to see the world as it really is. I dunno what to do.
japanese: いい大人のクセに、現実見えていないってのは、情けないよね。まいっちゃうなぁ、もう

definitions: 西[にし] (n) west
西[せい] (n) Spain
西[シャー] (n) west wind tile,winning hand with a pung (or kong) of west wind tiles
english: South of this town past the Mythril Mine and far to the west is a Shinra harbor called Junon.
japanese: この町の南にある【ミスリルマイン】を抜けてさらに西へ行くと【ジュノン】という神羅カンパニーの港があるの

definitions: 港[みなと] (n) harbour, harbor, port
港[こう] (suf) harbour
english: South of this town past the Mythril Mine and far to the west is a Shinra harbor called Junon.
japanese: この町の南にある【ミスリルマイン】を抜けてさらに西へ行くと【ジュノン】という神羅カンパニーの港があるの

definitions: 建物[たてもの] (n) building
english: They say there's a reactor and many tall buildings there. I hope to see it someday.
japanese: そこにも魔晄炉があって大きな建物がたくさん建っているそうよ。ああ、行ってみたいわぁ

definitions: 建つ[たつ] (v5t, vi) to be erected, to be built
english: They say there's a reactor and many tall buildings there. I hope to see it someday.
japanese: そこにも魔晄炉があって大きな建物がたくさん建っているそうよ。ああ、行ってみたいわぁ

definitions: 世[よ] (n) world, society, public,life, lifetime,age, era, period, epoch, generation,reign, rule,the times,world (of existence)
世[せい] (n-suf) counter for generations,epoch
english: The world's at peace… all's well.
japanese: すべて、世は事もなし……、っと。和平じゃのう

definitions: 和平[わへい] (n, vs) peace
english: The world's at peace… all's well.
japanese: すべて、世は事もなし……、っと。和平じゃのう

definitions: ご飯[ごはん] (n) cooked rice,meal
誤判[ごはん] (n) misjudgement, misjudgment, erroneous judgement, miscarriage of justice
午飯[ごはん] (n) lunch
english: I got my health, and enough to eat… all's well.
japanese: 今日も元気だ、ごはんがうまい……、っと。和平じゃのう

definitions: 様変わり[さまがわり] (n, vs) changing completely, transformation
english: The world's changed a lot in the past few days…
japanese: この数日で、この世界は大きく様変わりしてしまった……

definitions: 天空[てんくう] (n) sky, air, ether, firmament, the heavens
english: That huge Meteor is covering up the sky and acting like it owned it.
japanese: 天空をおおうメテオ……我が物顔でかっぽする巨大なモンスター……

definitions: 我が物顔[わがものがお] (adj-na, n) looking or acting as if one owned the place
english: That huge Meteor is covering up the sky and acting like it owned it.
japanese: 天空をおおうメテオ……我が物顔でかっぽする巨大なモンスター……

definitions: 闊歩[かっぽ] (n, vs) striding, swaggering, strutting,lording it over others, acting as though one owns the place, throwing one's weight around
english: That huge Meteor is covering up the sky and acting like it owned it.
japanese: 天空をおおうメテオ……我が物顔でかっぽする巨大なモンスター……

definitions: 和紙[わし] (n) washi, Japanese paper
鷲[わし] (n) eagle (Accipitridae family)
儂[わし] (pn) I, me
english: A lot of my friends have died…
japanese: ……ワシの友人も、おおぜい死んでしまった

definitions: 衣服[いふく] (n) clothes
威服[いふく] (n, vs) awe into submission
畏服[いふく] (n, vs) awe
異腹[いふく] (n) child of a different mother
息吹く[いぶく] (v5k, vi) to breathe
english: I'm goin' on a journey to pray for their souls.
japanese: ワシは、死んでしまった友人たちのめいふくをいのる旅に出ようと思う

definitions: 祈る[いのる] (v5r, vt) to pray, to wish
english: I'm goin' on a journey to pray for their souls.
japanese: ワシは、死んでしまった友人たちのめいふくをいのる旅に出ようと思う

definitions: 没[ぼつ] (pref) death,rejection (of a manuscript, etc.),lacking, without
ボツ (n) rejection (of a manuscript, etc.)
english: A map that was sunk along with the ship. ..."Guidebook" A rose that blooms once every 1000 years in the desert. ..."Desert Rose" A harp that soothes those who hear it. ..."Earth Harp"
japanese: 沈ぼつ船とともに沈んだというめい界の地図。……【ガイドブック】千年に一度、砂ばくにさくという花。……【デザートローズ】きく者の心をおだやかにするたてごと。……【アースハープ】

definitions: 水中[すいちゅう] (n, adj-no) underwater
english: OH! It's "Guidebook"! Wanna trade it for this Underwater Materia?
japanese: おお、それは【ガイドブック】！ワシの持っている【水中呼吸マテリア】と交換せぬか？

english: OH! It's "Desert Rose"! Wanna trade it for that Chocobo over there?
japanese: おお、それは【デザートローズ】！ワシのペットの【チョコボ】と交換せぬか？

definitions: 成立[せいりつ] (n, vs) formation, establishment, materialization, coming into existence,conclusion (e.g. of a deal), approval, completion, arrangement,being valid (of a theory, argument, etc.), holding, applying
english: Ok then, it's a done deal!
japanese: よし、交換成立じゃな

definitions: 潜水[せんすい] (n, vs) diving, submerging, going underwater
english: it's Underwater Materia. Go on, it's yours!
japanese: 【潜水マテリア】じゃ。持っていってくれ

definitions: 弔う[とむらう] (v5u, vt) to mourn for, to condole with (family, etc.),to hold a memorial service (for)
english: I guess it's time to go on a journey for the souls of my departed friends…
japanese: では、ワシはとむらいの旅に行くとするか……

definitions: チョコ (n) chocolate
english: Looks like my Stable's full. I'll come back when I have room.
japanese: 『チョコぼう』がいっぱいだな。空きをつくってから連れていくことにしよう
